summary:
Have bored with monotonous dungeons? Draugr Deathlords are not challenging anymore? Each Draugr behave like the others? Enhance your crawling experience with the Shouting Draugrs mod!
Draugrs have learned new shouts, and now they may be REALLY DANGEROUS!
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][b]DESCRIPTION[/b][/size]

Have bored with monotonous dungeons? Draugr Deathlords are not challenging anymore? Each Draugr behave like the others? Enhance your crawling experience with the Shouting Draugrs mod! Now almost every Draugr is unique and dangerous!

Now powerful Draugrs know few more shouts in addition to conventional Unrelenting Force and Disarm. Draugrs can use following  thu\'ums and their combinations now:

Unrelenting Force
Disarm
Fire Breath
Frost Breath
Marked for Death
Ice Form (be careful, cause this shout is very dangerous).

Each Draugr from Scourge to Death Overlord know one to four of the shouts depending on it\'s range (Scourges - 1 shout, Overlords and Deathlords - 2 shouts, Wight Lords and Scourge Lords- 3 shouts, Death Overlords - 4 shouts).

Enjoy your new experience and good luck!

[size=5][b]REQUIREMENTS[/b][/size]
This mod requires only Skyrim.esm as a master file.
This mod is compatible with both Dawnguard and Dragonborn, but it doesn\'t  endow Hulking Draugrs with shouts so far.

[size=5][b]COMPATIBILITY[/b][/size]
Since this mod changes Draugr\'s level lists, most probably it won\'t work with any essential Draugr\'s replacers.

[size=5][b]CHANGE LOG[/b][/size]
V 1.0 - first out-of-beta version, try it!
Dragonborn update will be realised soon.

Spanish translation may be found here:
skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36748

[size=4][color=green]Please, feel free to comment the mod and make proposals regarding following development.[/color][/size]
author: FarRenGate
